subject: AI & Agents
title: Training Pipelines with Orchestrators
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Training Pipelines with Orchestrators.

hook.text: Step 1: fetch data. Step 2: preprocess. Step 3: train. Step 4: evaluate. Manually? No.

buildup.text: Pipeline orchestrators automate multi-step ML workflows with dependency management.

discovery.text: Kubeflow Pipelines, Airflow, and Prefect define DAGs of tasks that execute in order.

twist.text: Orchestrators add complexity. For small teams, a Makefile or shell script may be enough.

climax.text: Caching intermediate results prevents re-running expensive steps when only downstream changes.

punchline.text: Automate the pipeline. Focus on the science.

quiz.question: What do ML pipeline orchestrators manage?
